<title level="1" right="Trait">[Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

This effect alters a creature's emotions. Effects with this trait always have the [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.
